description:
The members of Jupiter — Amagase Touma, Mitarai Shouta, and Ijuuin Hokuto — are aiming to be the best in the idol industry. As their concerts start selling out and their popularity increase, they experience issues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: THE IDOLM@STER Prologue SideM Episode of Jupiter
